entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
